simplified: 一瓶子不响，半瓶子晃荡

pronunciation.pinyin: yī píng zi bù xiǎng , bàn píng zi huàng dang
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: yi1 ping2 zi5 bu4 xiang3 , ban4 ping2 zi5 huang4 dang5

details.simplified: 一瓶子不响，半瓶子晃荡
details.traditional: 一瓶子不響，半瓶子晃蕩

meanings.value: lit. a full bottle makes no sound; a half-filled bottle sloshes
fig. empty vessels make the most noise
